p: The main component found in the essential oil of the aerial part of S. macrostema was pulegone, followed by linalool, thymol, limonene, caryophyllene, and menthone. The essential oil of S. macrostema (1 mg/mL) showed a free radical scavenging activity close to that from the synthetic BHT or ascorbic acid. The thymol presented greatest antioxidant activity at 0.1 mg/mL and limonene showed a TAC at 0.01 mg/mL, while caryophyllene, linalool, pulegone, and menthone showed a lower antioxidant activity.
